Token.Abstract: Provides a configurable and dynamic mechanism for retrieving required data about subscription content.
Initializes a data source with subscriptions that require data lookups

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns an initialized unstarted data source

Token.Abstract: Initializes a data source with individual assets that require data lookups

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns an initialized unstarted data source

Token.Abstract: Processes a data lookup operation using the initalized subscription data

ReturnValue.Abstract: If the data source was initialized with subscriptions, via the initWithSubscriptions method, then a NSDictionary where the keys are subscription IDs and the values are NSArrays containing NSDictionaries representing asset data, with key-value data as defined in SubscriptionAssetDataAttributes. If the data source was initialized with assets, via the initWithAssets method, then a single NSArray is returned directly, without the top NSDictionary package.
